Slackbot Actor¶

In this section, we will learn how to use Webhooks with Actors to send notifications/messages to Slack.

Objectives for this session

  • To build an Actor that sends a Slack Notification using Webhook

Sections:

  • Slackbot Actor
  • Build and deploy
  • The Webbook
  • Write the Actor Function
  • Write the Dockerfile
  • Build Docker Container
  • Create the Actor
  • Submit a Message to the Actor
  • List Executions of Actor
  • Check the Logs for an Execution
